messages.message: Hi team, not sure who to ping to check if this feature request will be picked up, will not be planned, etc. Can anyone offer any insight https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-3651 Customer is asking for updates on the request.
Ping @jack.robbins for product and @Serena for eng insights
It seems like this is related to this ticket I raised: https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-3279

We’re considering function reuse among a number of high priority projects for Q2, but can’t provide a definitive timeline at the moment since we need to do formal planning. We’ll probably know more about where this sits by mid-April. 

However, I’ll be working with the design team over the next few weeks to get into the details on the requirements and prototypes- mind if we reach out once we’ve made a bit more progress on that?
@jack.robbins Could you please share the PRD with SolEng grup once we have the first draft ready? I tihnk the team will definitely have good feedback based on the ground experience.
Yep, that might come later this week! Note that the first focus is on custom functions, not entire fields / prompts, but also happy to discuss those.
